website_summaries.verdict: It's a little pricier than some others, but this model uses primarily aluminum in its construction for durability.
pros: Offers up to 260 pounds of lifting capacity, which is impressive for this type of tool
Handle and suction cups both consist of aluminum, creating a tough product
A bit larger than some others at 14 by 4.8 by 3.3 inches for plenty of lifting capability
cons: Won't adhere well to rough surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Pull on Daily in my shower
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy I have it in my Shower and use it daily as a safety tool. Put it on the shower wall and done it is stuck
customer_reviews.author: Camp LIGHT

customer_reviews.title: holding power
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to attach a homemade kayak rack to the rear of my motorhome without drilling holes and this product solved the problem. The holding power is great, at 190 lbs. I could not pull it loose without using the releases. Purchased a third one to attach a temporary cell phone booster antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Mathiesen

customer_reviews.title: Flag pole  pole mount for travel trailer.
customer_reviews.text: Used these to mount sectional flagpole to fifth wheel full timing travel trailer without drilling holes. Used it to 1. Raise cell phone booster. 2. Hold flag pole solar/led light as yard/security light. 3. Hold flag. 4. Hold led light string while boondocking. Stronger cell signal(Surecall) plus unlimited data = faster wifi cell phone signal + Amazon Fire stick + Amazon Prime = no satellite tv dish . Drilled 2 holes in each handle to attach mounting brackets for pole. Be sure to keep rubber protected with 303 Protectant as the rubber is not designed for long term outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: happy hetero

customer_reviews.title: safety non existant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my security in the shower. After following instruction the suction cups did not hold the item to th shower wall. I am a 86 year lady and live alone - if I had fallen it would be very serious This is not what it claims to be. false advertisimg. I followed the instructions on the box and am afraid to be alone when this happens again. RETURN DO NOT REPLACE - TOO DANGEROUS DO NOT SEND A REPLACEMENT NO NO NO
customer_reviews.author: mimiguy

customer_reviews.title: Kind of amazing.  STRONG!!!
customer_reviews.text: I need two temporary handrails in the shower as I will be getting a knee replacement soon. These grippers are amazingly strong. Easy to "install," taking only a few seconds to set the two suction cups. I pressed the grip handle into the wall before activating the suction cup levers to give the device a head start by depleting as much air under the suction cups as possible. A very viable alternative to installing permanent hand rails if you have smooth tile walls.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goodkin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was told this item would work on clean smooth shower tile. Does not stay stuck
customer_reviews.author: ShomonR

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is great suction! I’ve used it in numerous applications. For taking large mirrors off walls, For a grab handle on ceramic tile and My favorite is putting it on my sliding glass door as a lock So my dog can’t nose the door open! Maybe I’ll post a picture when it isn’t so cold here in Minnesota. Yes it works in sub zero weather which was one thing I was worried about.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl burger

customer_reviews.title: Not for the disabled
customer_reviews.text: It will stay up thru the bath and hep me to get back on my feet, but that is it which is fine for me. But not work well for a disabled person. I would not use it for my wife I paid a few bucks more and got her the OXO Good Grips Strong Hold Suction Balance Assist Bar for Bath and Shower with Non Slip Grip , you can not beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones you want!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these metal suction handles, and one plastic handle, that I have been using for 6 months now in my shower. There is no comparison. The plastic handle comes off the wall frequently with any sort of pressure. These two handles have stayed firmly in place (one on glass, one on tile) since we installed them, definitely making a shower a more comfortable experience when you have a firm handle to grip as you enter and exit. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: CrayfishAndy

customer_reviews.title: I use them as handles on a large, heavy glass door
customer_reviews.text: Opening my sliding glass door was a real pain. Not only is it very heavy, and it closes off part of my house from the rest, sealing it off and creating a vacuum and that made it even harder to open. I bought two of these, one on each side and they make opening and closing the door easy. They seem pretty sturdy so I think they will last a while. I'll update if they fail, but I don't think they will. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: I fell into the front of my wife's curio cabinet and dislodged the whole front panel glass. Ordered a pair of these vacuum handles and successfully lifted the front glass panel back into place. The suction grip was more than adequate to lift and place the heavy tempered glass panel back into place. A successful ' DIY ' project at a much lower cost than if we had someone come out to the house, and the pride in doing the repair ourselves. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: TRUE multi surface suction lifter -- Wood floor
customer_reviews.text: Used this suction lifter for my crawl space opening with hardwood floor. My crawl space opening is in family room, and was obviously visible. My flooring guy built the crawl space opening that camouflages with wood plank lines. But adding a brass handles would have defeated the purpose. But this lifter solved my problem. lifts the 30lb access door with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Karan Bhonslay

customer_reviews.title: OPENS HEAVY PATIO DOORS WITH EASE
customer_reviews.text: It works great, sometimes we have older folks visiting and they were having trouble opening slider door on outside even though I had lubricated the track. The door opens now opens with ease. Its 4 inches wide. I wished the company had one around 2 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond W. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to close the gaps in my flooring. Rather than removing the base boards to gain access to the plank ends, I clamped this bad boy on and used a rubber mallet to close the gaps. Worked perfect and sturdy enough to hit with a hammer and not lose suction!
customer_reviews.author: CoreyH

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to help moving the thermal glass from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help moving the thermal glass from my storm doors to the basement in the spring and back up in the fall. I used to wrestle the doors down and bang into everything due to the weight and awkward size of the glass inserts. These made it a snap to move the inserts with no losing your balance or losing grip on the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help me remove a stuck storm window. It worked. It was easy to use and I was able to carry this awkward shaped long window effort. I have only used it for this problem so I can’t comment on its reliability.
customer_reviews.author: iris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an RV flag mount!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so we didn't have to drill holes in our camper. Wanted to display our American Flat, and this allows us to attach the pole to suction cups, and then attach them to the wall of the camper. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patty T

customer_reviews.title: Suction Cup Does Heavy Lifting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to open a heavy, tiled trap door to my crawl space. I purchased the item after reading several reviews on more expensively built items that were suited to lifting non-porous materials like glass. I needed this to work on tile w/o losing its grip. It does just that on a door that weighs about 30lbs. Highly recommended for semi-porous materials like tile.
customer_reviews.author: DOT

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! WORTHLESS!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish this thing sucked, if it sucked, I wouldn't be saying this thing sucks! :) It has great suction at first.... you can't pull it off. Come back 4 hours later and it falls off. Worthless, sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used as a Sliding door handle
customer_reviews.text: Looked for months for a glass sliding door handle at any price. The best was a handle for $150, but it would not fit. Finally discovered the GEKBOT, it attaches to the glass, makes opening and closing easy for people with long fingernails and easy for children. Bought two (one inside, one outside) three months ago. What a great find, no issues!
customer_reviews.author: David E Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty suction cup plate
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty suction cup plate. Easily holds up 100lbs materials. We used it to move large glasses without any hassle. Great product works well.
customer_reviews.author: opfanscoco

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna mount
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a temporary mount for a cell booster antenna (got the idea from another reviewer). Very strong hold, very solid construction. Easy to install and remove. Perfect for my trailer, but only works on flat planes (no curves!).
customer_reviews.author: D. Maier

customer_reviews.title: This is Much Better than Plastic
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a more sturdy one after our plastic one broke. This one is much better. We took it on vacation for use in hotel shower. It worked fine. It was so good, we bought 2 more. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AngelAnn

customer_reviews.title: good for laminate flooring
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my laminate flooring to seal little gaps. Worked perfectly! Its solid and can handle the beating of a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Laminate lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for fixing a small gap in my laminate flooring and... it did not disappoint. Saved so much time from having to pull flooring to fix. The metal handle allowed me to use a rubber mallet to bump the planks together. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Lifted 3/8 in 6ft glass securly. Great value for the money compared to the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: These holders are fantastic. Very sturdy construction. I used them to remove the glass from my shower to refinish the base. There were two pieces of 1/2 inch glass that were 36 inches by 96 inches and they worked flawlessly. The door was also 1/2 inch glass and was 34 inches by 96 inches. They also came with extra snaps for sun toon in case they break. The glass company wanted $1100 to remove and reinstall the glass and I did it for less than $50.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Hudak

customer_reviews.title: Used one not new
customer_reviews.text: This is used one, the box is open, oil on the handle. Functional is OK
customer_reviews.author: Joey H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the handles marketed for helping people with disabilities
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our elderly parent. It’s way better than the devices marketed for this purpose. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Langfield

customer_reviews.title: Good product used properly
customer_reviews.text: Using on shower glass door just about a year without loosening.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting in and out of the bath tub
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my parents' bathtub so the dont slip going in and out. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jolyn Bush

customer_reviews.title: Grips glass like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to move some large mirrors, including one that’s 7’ x 5’. They worked wonderfully, making a job that was impossible using other tools quite easy. They grip very well and have a nice texturing on the handles that helps assure a solid grip.
customer_reviews.author: J Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool to use to repair separation of the planks ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool to use to repair separation of the planks of my laminate flooring; Combined with a rubber mallet, easy and effective.Saved a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: GoBucks

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work to remove and install windows. Handy.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskantimberwolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making wake shaper!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use to make a wake shaper. The suction power is insane! Glad we found one with the stainless Steele finish!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Elizabeth Scott

customer_reviews.title: No Fails
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just make sure surface is clean. I bought two of these to lift BIG sliders out of track to change rollers. Worked like a charm. Made job a lot easier and safer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Work great to move heavy shower door. Value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: I am well pleased with this product. Quality glass with ease.
customer_reviews.author: viva a. atkins

customer_reviews.title: it work so well
customer_reviews.text: I can not believed this product can do more than 50 lbs material, I am so happy to have it, very soon I will get it again, thank you for the good product you are make.
customer_reviews.author: Alen Truong

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sturdy, strong, and came with replacement switches. Fast service from seller
customer_reviews.author: RALPH

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy sticks to glass like a high powered magnet
customer_reviews.author: Shoup

customer_reviews.title: These suction cups will pick up a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.text: It works. We used it to pick up a 5’ x 8’ vinyl double pane picture window from the ground to 6’ up to where it was installed. Couldn’t have done it without it. Also had 6 windows 42” x 8’. Same features as the larger window. We had one on each side for each guy. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Worked well gripping laminate flooring
customer_reviews.text: Our construction company bought this product to fix the gaps which commonly appear in floating floor laminate jobs. It worked excellent and accomplished the job easily without loosing its grip.
customer_reviews.author: John Wrigley

customer_reviews.title: powerful tool
customer_reviews.text: I mounted a flag bracket to it and secured it to the side of my motor home so I could fly a 3x5 American flag. It stayed put for over 5 days and allowed me to display my flag without any drilling.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Howe

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for handling a plate glass mirror that I had to remove from a wall that it was glued to in order to replace a bathroom countertop. They worked perfectly for moving mirror and also replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN E NARUSIEWICZ

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable for cleaning fireplace glass.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. This product is very handy for cleaning the glass in our sealed fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I used these to replace some heavy glass panels. They made a difficult job easy. I'm glad to have then in my arsenal of tools....Thanks Handle on Demand.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to close gaps in my laminate floor. It was a very quick and easy process. This had been on the 'honey do' list for a couple of weeks and I got tired of waiting. I had 5 gaps in my floor and was able to surprise my husband by fixing them all by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Handled the lifting and placement of heavy glass shower door. Couldn't have done it with them
customer_reviews.author: z-man

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a shower safety bar. It's been on the shower wall for the past 2 weeks and my elderly mom has used it for 3 days and it's still stuck to the wall. There's no signs of rust. Too bad this product isn't available any longer. I need to buy one more.
customer_reviews.author: SusieK.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY HOLDS AMOUNT OF WEIGHT.
customer_reviews.text: WAS ABLE TO LIFT A REALLY HEAVY GLASS TABLE TOP.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Seitz

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to install two rear door windows in my cargo van. Would not have succeeded if I did not have these suction cup lifters. Made lining up the windows and adjusting painless. I do not know how someone could carry the windows and mount them without these suction cups because if I had held on to the edges, I could have made a mess of the urethane or dropped the glass.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I used them to build a roof rack for my camaro.
customer_reviews.author: Keg

customer_reviews.title: Surprising tool
customer_reviews.text: These things work great. And for the money they are amazing. I purchased 2 to help with installing heavy sliding glass doors, work perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Griesshaber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and very useful. The shipment was quick and good.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and very useful. The shipment was quick and good.
customer_reviews.author: Middleman

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Suction Cup Lifter
customer_reviews.text: Well made, holds good suction when clamped down. Used it in repairing some laminate flooring in my house.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS EVARD

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, but light use only.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while the handles lasted. Had a lot of grab, but the mechanism doesn't seem to hold up to alot of repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Burby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a temporary grab bar in a shower. It is strong and attaches quickly and well.
customer_reviews.author: Swerve

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well, I haven't had it release. I highly recommend, The price is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: andrew madril

customer_reviews.title: they are not safe to use they fall by them self.
customer_reviews.text: in the shower for my father in law, they didn't work they fell off the shower wall the good thing he was not using them at the time, he is 90 years old. and I can't even get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: dolores garza

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s made for
customer_reviews.text: This suction cups with handles performed as intended to help me lift glass off of my table.
customer_reviews.author: Del Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. I challenge anyone to pull this loose once it is in place. I'm using it on the bathtub to assist in getting out. Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: D. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used to make a wake enhancer for wakesurfing. 2 seasons so far still working.
customer_reviews.author: slozack

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I like the aluminum design over the plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I like the aluminum design over the plastic ones, muck sturdier. I have used to pick up glass and works great. I've also put this on my boat and hung from it and it held my nearly 200lb butt up with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Dnm529

customer_reviews.title: A great versatile product
customer_reviews.text: Using in shower for my wife who has ALS ALLOWS HER TO TAKE A SHOWER COMFORTABLY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl Flooring
customer_reviews.text: Used this to close the gap between my vinyl floors. Worked great and only took a few taps to work.
customer_reviews.author: S Batts

customer_reviews.title: Sure and steady grip.
customer_reviews.text: Had huge shower door to carry up 3 flights of stairs. Sure and steady grip, didn’t slip or slide.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Diaz

customer_reviews.title: 90 lbs of glass like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, a must have tool for working with glass shower doors.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction power!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Talk about heavy-duty suction performance. Used this to lift and place 100+ pound marble stone slabs down and it was effective! Best purchase made.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Strong & sturdy. Suction lasts as long as needed.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I used it to lift a 200 lb slab of granite for a fireplace hearth.

customer_reviews.title: tough jobs are made easy. This is that tool
customer_reviews.text: When you have the right tool, tough jobs are made easy. This is that tool.

customer_reviews.title: It does and is what it claims to be.
customer_reviews.text: It does and is what it claims to be. Not sure about the long term reliability so only 4 stars

customer_reviews.title: Its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very light with excellent grip. The suction is super. I will definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They are doing what they are supposed to do. Perfect!

customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've used it when I change out glass inserts on entry doors and it holds very well.

customer_reviews.text: I used this for my mounting base for a wake shaper for my boat. Plenty of suction for this application, and im applying a ton of force to this. The picture is my prototype, not actual

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my truck. I have Sirius XM Radio and needed a better antenna. Connect to my antenna look it up to the window

product_meta.title: Gekbot Glass Suction Cups/Tile Lifter/Floor Gap Fixer/Laminate Repair/Dent Remover Puller/Mirror Holder/Suction Cup Hooks/High Performance Strong Suction Heavy Duty Aluminum Vacuum Plate Handle
feature_bullets: Strong Stuction: 260 lbs maximum lifting capacity in level, 220 lbs working load capacity in vertical.Performance Certification Tested PDF Available below at "Technical Specification" for details

Great tools for lifting glass/windshield, pulling dents, adjust laminate floor, handling glasses, sheet metal panels material, window, tile, granite, mirror, plank flooring and any clean non-porous surface; repair laminate floor gaps.
Heavy duty Suction cup handle made with durable aluminium material for strong grip; verified for performance certificate (see pdf below).
With two 4-3/4 inch in diameter high quality suction pads with thickness 6mm.

Must be mounted on a clean, smooth, flat surface. Use it with caution. Our suction cup has been tested for the performance 330lbf/ 149.8kgf; however, we do not recommend to lift at this weight with man power.

specifications.Style: Performance Certification Tested PDF Available below at "Technical Specification" for details
